content:
In the following tutorial you will be guided through the 
 basic game mechanics. 
 
 This will take you about 10 min.

Here are the default keybindings for the game. 
 You can change them later in the keybindings menu. 
 
 W - move forward 
 A - move left 
 S - move back 
 D - move right 
 LeftShift- sprint 
 E - interaction 
 Esc - cancel
Signs help you to understand the game concepts better. Let's find one!

Books can be found anywhere! 
 Interact with them to learn something new...

NPCs are always a great opportunity to gain some additional knowledge and hints. 
 Press E to talk to them!

Bored walking around all the time? 
 Teleporters might help you...
